# llms.txt for https://www.infinitetalk.net
# This file provides guidance to LLM crawlers on allowed content

# -------------------------------------
# ‚úÖ Website Information
Website: https://www.infinitetalk.net
Name: InfiniteTalk AI
Description: InfiniteTalk AI is an advanced audio-driven video generation platform that creates infinite-length talking videos from any video or image. Features accurate lip synchronization, natural full-body motion, and consistent identity preservation powered by sparse-frame video dubbing technology.
